description:
Towano Chikai`s work is finally getting animated! The meeting with the director is just around the corner, but Sakura intrudes on their home after running away from hers. They both wind up hiding from Suzuka and spending the night together, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: About the Time I Got a New Little Sister
La fois où j`ai eu une nouvelle petite sœur
Ore ni Atarashiku Imouto ga Dekita Ken ni Tsuite
俺に新しく妹ができた件について
